Title: Mahn's Wish
Text:
Almighty Moontree Lodge,

I have a secret to tell you.
Shhhâ€”I might have awakened my incredible abilities like the heroes in hero plays.
Well... I'm saying this because... I could only eat one bowl of rice for lunch in the past, but now I can finish two large bowls! Also, I used to have to step on a small bench to touch the branches of Grandpa Tree, but now I only need to jump casually to touch them!
I feel like something amazing is burning inside my body. Is this what it feels like to become a great hero? I've been waiting for ages now. I wonder when I'll be able to use amazing powers like Blaze Ranger...
Moontree Lodge, oh Moontree Lodge, the adults all say that you can make any wish come true... Can you help me become a great hero?

Mahn
